page.title: 11EVERYDAY LIFE IN DUNS
page.content: {ENTERTAINMENT}COMES FROM AMATEUR OPERATIC, DRAMATIC, CHORAL, ORCHERTRAL & FOLK GROUPS & A FILM SOCIETY. THE ARTS COUNCIL OCCASIONALLY SPONSORS ENTERTAINMENT. PUB ENTERTAINMENT & DISCOS ARE INFREQUENT. REIVERS WEEK PROVIDES SUMMER ENTERTAINMENT. {LIFESTYLE}IS QUIET & RURAL. THE NATIVE POPULATION IS STABLE & INCOMERS COME TO WORK OR RETIRE. MANY SHOP DAILY, OTHERS GO WEEKLY TO LARGER TOWNS. MOST FIND HEALTH, WELFARE, EDUCATION & AMENITIES SATISFACTORY. TEENAGERS ARE INTERESTED IN POP CULTURE. A TINY MINORITY FOLLOW EXTREME FASHIONS. ADULTS VISIT LIBRARY, NATURE RESERVE & SPORTS FACILITIES. IN MANY FAMILIES BOTH PARENTS WORK. CHILDREN WATCH MUCH T.V. MORE PEOPLE THAN BEFORE LEAVE DUNS FOR HOLIDAYS. A SMALL GAMBLING SHOP EXISTS FOR A MINORITY GROUP. INNS ARE WELL USED IN THE EVENINGS.
